+// Decode the contents of a BMP file
+class DecodeBmpOp : public OpKernel {

body: Given how simple bmp's implementation is, I think we can avoid the need for a bmp_io library; can we just inline the Decode implementation into this OpKernel?  There'll be much fewer files and changes to make if we do that!
body_html: Given how simple bmp's implementation is, I think we can avoid the need for a bmp_io library; can we just inline the Decode implementation into this OpKernel? There'll be much fewer files and changes to make if we do that!
